name: Cantaloupe-Star Anise Sorbet
keywords: cantaloupe, star anise, sugar, dairy-free, low-fat, nut-free, dessert, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 very ripe cantaloupes, peeled, seeded and cut into large chunks

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, puree cantaloupe until smooth. This should yield at least 4 cups. In a large saucepan, combine 4 cups cantaloupe puree, star anise, sugar, corn syrup and 1 cup water. Place over medium-low heat and stir just until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and let rest for at least 2 hours at room temperature.
Strain through a fine sieve, pressing out as much juice as possible. Pour liquid into an ice cream maker and follow manufacturer's instructions.
